attributes.action: Stop the smell of pasties and chips, on the streets of Looe!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The smell of fried food and pasties wafting the streets of Looe is most nauseating to local people! Thereby causing nuisance!and atracting Gulls!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
